body: The move constructor TensorBase(TensorBase && rhs) still assigns `nullptr` to `rhs`. Should that be the undefined tensor? (GitHub won't let me comment at the correct line of code)
body_html: The move constructor TensorBase(TensorBase && rhs) still assigns nullptr to rhs. Should that be the undefined tensor? (GitHub won't let me comment at the correct line of code)
